alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Southern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 2:59AM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Light snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton, Southern High Plains and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick or snow covered road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than one mile at times. Snow drifting onto the roadway could also make roads difficult to navigate in spots.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Southern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County
